description:
ith Sugar Boy, Bydo, and Hughes all defeated, Gray and Natsu try to figure out a way to get to the Dragon Chain Cannon and use it to save everyone, instead of using it to ram the lacrima into Extalia like King Faust intends. But the room is sealed with an anti-wizard barrier, and time is running out! Just then, Erza appears, but is it the Erza that brings hope, or despair?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le harpon du dragon de l`apocalypse
